sarc.name: Name
sarc.login-failed-msg: Login failed, please check your name and password
sarc.bio-msg: Please provide the bio. information for accurate assesment.
sarc.bind-msg: This card is Associated to you, please proceed tests.
sarc.card-msg: User crad reader to get card no
sarc.gq-desc: The Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire for Everyone
sarc.aq: Follow-up Questions about your medical condition(s)
sarc.gqq1: Has your doctor ever said that you have a heart condition OR high blood pressure?
sarc.gqq2: Do you feel pain in your chest at rest, during your daily activities of living, OR when you do physical activity?
sarc.gqq3: Do you lose balance because of dizziness OR have you lost consciousness in the last 12 months? Please answer NO if your dizziness was associated with over-breathing (including during vigorous exercise).
sarc.gqq4: Have you ever been diagnosed with another chronic medical condition (other than heart disease or high blood pressure)?
sarc.gqq5: Are you currently taking prescribed medications for a chronic medical condition?
sarc.gqq6: Do you currently have (or have had within the past 12 months) a bone, joint, or soft tissue (muscle, ligament, or tendon) problem that could be made worse by becoming more physically active? Please answer NO if you had a problem in the past, but it does not limit your current ability to be physically active.
sarc.gqq7: Has your doctor ever said that you should only do medically supervised physical activity?
sarc.aqq1: Do you have Arthritis, Osteoporosis, or Back Problems?
sarc.aqq2: Do you currently have Cancer of any kind?
sarc.need-aq-msg: One or more of the above answer(s) is(are) 'Yes', please answer the follow-up questions
sarc.aqq3: Do you have a Heart or Cardiovascular Condition? This includes Coronary Artery Disease, Heart Failure, Diagnosed Abnormality of Heart Rhythm.
sarc.aqq4: Do you have High Blood Pressure?
sarc.aqq5: Do you have any Metabolic Conditions? This includes Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Pre-Diabetes.
sarc.aqq6: Do you have any Mental Health Problems or Learning Difficulties? This includes Alzheimer’s, Dementia, Depression, Anxiety Disorder, Eating Disorder, Psychotic Disorder, Intellectual Disability, Down Syndrome.
sarc.aqq7: Do you have a Respiratory Disease? This includes Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, Asthma, Pulmonary High Blood Pressure.
sarc.aqq8: Do you have a Spinal Cord Injury? This includes Tetraplegia and Paraplegia.
sarc.aqq9: Have you had a Stroke? This includes Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA) or Cerebrovascular Event.
sarc.aqq10: Do you have any other medical condition not listed above or do you have two or more medical conditions?
